title: Yellowstone National Park: WUAMP: Human Dimensions
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning     Winter Use in Yellowstone National Park     Winter Use Adaptive Management Program     WUAMP: Human Dimensions                  Winter Use Adaptive Management Program: Human Dimensions       Background and Area of Focus The Human Dimensions Working Group will make recommendations to the NPS on the design of an updated monitoring strategy that 1) measures and evaluates the impacts of winter use on the visitor experience, and other relevant publics, and 2) assesses changes in winter visitation under the new winter use plan and how such changes impact park resources. Meeting Notes February 18, 2014 Meeting Notes April 10, 2014 Meeting Notes April 28, 2014 Meeting Notes  Monitoring Strategy Other Supporting Materials
